description:
David Crowley, the writer and independent film director of """"Gray State"""" was found dead along with his 5 years old daughter and wife on Jan 17th 2015.They killed him and made it look like a suicide. They
took down his website and put an end to the movie being released to the general public. This is an old news, but it needs to be brought up every once in a while simply because it's a clear description of what's coming soon, no other film was going to be this close to the truth. Independent Director David Crowley was going to expose many of the elites' New world order 'agendas through his film """"Gray State"""".His unfinished film covers elements of FEMA camps, Martial Law, civil unrest, economic collapse, RFID chips, and many more. He was trying to warn#nwo #hollyweird#bollywood#truthbomb#illuminati#agenda21#truthseeker#wakeup#unplugthematrix#newworldorder#billgates#truth#india#pedowood#movie#world#america#usa#rfidchip#freedom#realtalk
